replies.body: Or you could just get QSS or GA and make him useless while not hurting yourself unnecessarily. QSS + Flash makes it close to impossible for Zed to kill you unless you just sit there and let him.

GA has a 5 minute cooldown, flash has a 3 minute cooldown, Zed's ult has an 80 second cooldown with no CDR (much lower with CDR) 
so buying GA and using flash to escape lets her get out of 1 out of 6 of his ults. while the Zhonya's has a cooldown much similar to Zed's ult and unlike QSS it doesn't let the rest of his combo hit her.

Like i said (i was the Azir) you know a champ is OP when he forces you to buy an AP item on an AD champ.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Xge891IA,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-02-08T01:12:05.429+0000)
>
> GA has a 5 minute cooldown, flash has a 3 minute cooldown, Zed's ult has an 80 second cooldown with no CDR (much lower with CDR) 
> so buying GA and using flash to escape lets her get out of 1 out of 6 of his ults. while the Zhonya's has a cooldown much similar to Zed's ult and unlike QSS it doesn't let the rest of his combo hit her.
> 
> Like i said (i was the Azir) you know a champ is OP when he forces you to buy an AP item on an AD champ.

Flash has a 5 minute cooldown which can be made lower with masteries and boots.

You get QSS, then when he Ults you Flash out of his shurikens, QSS his Ignite + Ult and now he's dead unless you've fed him to oblivion.

With GA you Flash out of his shurikens and force him to burn everything to try and pop your GA while you either kill him or do a ton of damage and your team finishes him off.

You could also get both (I hate doing that) and make him literally useless. You're not forced to buy Zhonya's at all as there's heaps of counterplay and counterbuilding to beat Zed. As Azir you could also place your Soldiers and aim your abilities properly as well as fix the timing on your Ult.

My bad, 5 minutes, that only proved my point more that it isn't always up.

all your combinations of escape involve using flash or GA, both of which can only be down once every 5 minutes, its not exactly a countermeasure you can implement every teamfight.


Also in fights i would just place my soldiers on Jinx because he would just go straight for her, What do you mean fix the timing on my ult? at what point in his combo should i ult him?

if i ult him before he casts anything, he just uses W over the wall, if i ult him after he used W he just R's over the wall, if i ult him after he uses his R, he just presses R again to switch back behind the wall again.
Yea she tried it, but with it she could only block his ult, not all the combo damage. (which was enough to kill her by itself)
